name: NPM registry chatbot
description: An inline Telegram chatbot that queries npm register and returns the results

TELEGRAM_API_TOKEN.description: Telegram API token for the chatbot

TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK_PORT.description: The port to listen to. Takes precedence over the heroku defined one

TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK_BINDINGHOST.description: The host or IP to bind to. Defaults to 0.0.0.0
